emerging_technologies.name: AI-Driven Code Autonomy
emerging_technologies.description: AI systems that autonomously generate, debug, and optimize code, reducing human intervention in software development.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Potential job displacement in coding professions, increased productivity in software development, ethical considerations in AI authorship and intellectual property.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Acceptance by software development communities, regulatory frameworks for AI-generated code, and integration with existing development tools.

emerging_technologies.name: Quantum-Resistant Blockchain
emerging_technologies.description: Blockchain algorithms designed to withstand quantum computing attacks, ensuring long-term security in decentralized systems.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Ensures the longevity of blockchain applications in the face of quantum computing advancements, safeguarding financial and personal data.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Need for secure digital infrastructure, government and industry push for quantum-safe technologies, integration with existing blockchain networks.

emerging_technologies.name: Neuralink BCI 2.0
emerging_technologies.description: An advanced version of the brain-computer interface allowing for more complex interactions, including memory enhancement and cognitive tools.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Raises ethical questions about human enhancement, potential for inequality based on access, and privacy concerns with brain data.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Technological maturity, public perception of brain implants, regulatory approval, and ethical considerations.

emerging_technologies.name: Hyperloop Transport
emerging_technologies.description: High-speed, vacuum-sealed tube transport system using magnetic levitation for passenger and freight transport.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Reduces travel time significantly, potential for urban sprawl, environmental benefits from reduced emissions, economic impacts on traditional transport industries.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Infrastructure development, regulatory approval, public acceptance, and integration with existing transport networks.

emerging_technologies.name: SpaceX's Starship Human Settlement
emerging_technologies.description: Permanent human settlements on Mars or the Moon, utilizing advanced life support systems and resource extraction technologies.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Potential for multi-planetary human existence, psychological and social impacts of living in space, economic considerations of space colonization.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Technological advancements in life support, public interest in space exploration, funding, and international cooperation.

mainstream_technologies.name: AI-Powered Software Development
mainstream_technologies.description: AI tools like Cursor AI become standard in software development, enhancing productivity and reducing coding errors.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widely adopted by tech companies and software developers, with integration into major IDEs and development platforms.

mainstream_technologies.name: Autonomous Vehicles
mainstream_technologies.description: Fully autonomous vehicles become mainstream for both personal and commercial transport, supported by smart infrastructure.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widespread acceptance in cities and regions with supportive infrastructure, with regulatory frameworks in place for safety.

epoch_themes.description: AI technologies are increasingly integrated into daily life, automating tasks from coding to transport.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Increased productivity, job displacement, ethical concerns around AI decision-making, and privacy issues.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Global push towards AI integration, with varying levels of adoption and regulation based on cultural and economic factors.

epoch_themes.description: Focus on sustainable technologies to manage urban growth and environmental impact.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Improved urban living conditions, reduced pollution, potential for urban sprawl, and changes in land use patterns.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increasing urbanization worldwide, with a focus on sustainability and resilience against climate change.

epoch_themes.description: Humanity's expansion into space, from exploration to colonization.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Potential for multi-planetary existence, new economic opportunities, and psychological impacts of living in space.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Rising interest in space exploration, with public-private partnerships driving development and investment.
